Hi Cheryl, 
I hope you have been able to get the information you need about building an interactive splash pad. We do have a few documents on the Knowledge Network that include information on splash pads and they are listed below. 
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/6293
Is a document including all kinds of information about different swimming pools including splash pads
http://webapps.icma.org/pm/8911/public/feature2.cfm
Is an article about different pools with one including a splash pad in the set up. 
I hope you find these resources helpful!
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Cheryl Greiner
text:
The City of North Port is exploring building an interactive splash pad (playground) and I am requesting information from other municipalities with this type of amenity:
                What was the estimated construction cost
                What are the annual operating cost
                Do you charge a user fee
                What are the dimensions of your water feature
                What year was it constructed
                Any lessons learned you wish to share 

I appreciate any information that you may wish to provide.  Please do not hesitate to contact me directly.
Cheryl
title: Interactive Splash pad construction & operating costs
